comment: Oh, badhiya bola bhai, hasa Diya tune to....Har muslim Mughal lineage ka nahi hai.. aur humare adhikar kitna hona chahiye wo humari tax filings, contribution towards development se tally karke derive karo.... We do not play sorry blame game like sanghis
amr:
# ::snt Oh, badhiya bola bhai, hasa Diya tune to....Har muslim Mughal lineage ka nahi hai.. aur humare adhikar kitna hona chahiye wo humari tax filings, contribution towards development se tally karke derive karo.... We do not play sorry blame game like sanghis
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / play-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (w / we)
            :ARG1 (g / game
                  :ARG1-of (b / blame-01)
                  :ARG1-of (s / sorry-01))
            :ARG1-of (r / resemble-01
                  :ARG2 (p2 / person
                        :mod (p3 / political-party
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Sanghis"))))
            :mod (o / oh
                  :mode expressive))
      :snt2 (h / have-03
            :ARG0 (w2 / we)
            :ARG1 (t / tune
                  :mod (p4 / person
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Allah")
                        :mod (l / lineage
                              :mod (r2 / religious-group
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "Islam")))))
            :mod h
            :ARG0 w2
            :ARG1 (n4 / nahi
                  :mode expressive))
      :snt3 (a / and
            :op1 (a2 / aur
                  :op1 (s2 / string-entity
                        :value "hikar"))
            :op2 (s3 / string-entity
                  :value "hikar"))
      :op3 (f / file-01
            :ARG1 (t2 / tax-01))
      :op4 (c / contribute-01
            :ARG2 (d / develop-02))
      :op5 (d2 / derive-01
            :ARG1 (k / karke)
            :ARG2 (k2 / karo))
      :snt4 p
      :ARG0 (w3 / we)
      :ARG1 g
      :ARG1-of b
      :ARG1-of s
      :ARG1-of r
      :ARG2 (p5 / person
            :mod (e / ethnic-group
                  :name (n5 / name
                        :op1 "Sanghis"))))
